## Discussion

This field is meaningful only if you enable [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReader/Options-swift.struct/includeErrorInReadResult] before you call [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReader/prepare(using:)]. If an error occurs while the [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReaderSession] is open and the framework can retrieve [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReadResult/paymentCardData], [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReadResult] includes both the [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReadResult/ReadOutcome] and the other read data, otherwise the framework throws a [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReaderSession/ReadError].

# outcome

**Instance Property**

The outcome of the transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
let outcome: PaymentCardReadResult.ReadOutcome
```

## Discussion

This field is meaningful only if you enable [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReader/Options-swift.struct/includeErrorInReadResult] before you call [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReader/prepare(using:)]. If an error occurs while the [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReaderSession] is open and the framework can retrieve [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReadResult/paymentCardData], [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReadResult] includes both the [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReadResult/ReadOutcome] and the other read data, otherwise the framework throws a [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardReaderSession/ReadError].

## Checking the read outcome

- **PaymentCardReadResult.ReadOutcome**: Values that describe the outcome of a read request.
